 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבַט‎</span>] **verb** ==thrust down, out, or away== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strike the ground*** with a person, i.e. throw one down; Syriac Pa\`el <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***incitavit, stimulavit***); — only **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect be thrust down, away***, i.e. ruined; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָם לֹא יָבִין יִלָּבֵט‎</span> [[Hos.4.14|Hos 4:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱוִיל שְׂפָתַיִם יִלָּבֵט‎</span> [[Prov.10.8|Prov 10:8]]; [[Prov.10.10|Prov 10:10]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבִיא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבִיָּא‎</span> see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לבא‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֻבִים‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּבִים‎</span>.
